comment._content: Just going on the state of construction on the Harbour Bridge the date has to be December 1930-January 1931 18/12/1930 investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/search.as... 28/1/1931 investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/search.as...
